welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Floridia, a charming city known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and delicious cuisine. Get ready to immerse yourself in its beauty and indulge in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport handles all commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at NAS Sigonella Airport handles all military and government flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Fontanarossa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Comiso Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Comiso Airport, mainly used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.
